name: Vampire Sonar (Trijam 167)
description:
Welcome to Vampire Sonar!

You're a vampire looking for a fabulous treasure in a dark cave. Even if your sight is not good, you've developed a really great hearing and thanks to your bat sonar, you can navigate in the dark. Locate the exit of the cave and find the hidden treasure!

How to play:

  • Move your vampire using the arrows or WASD or ZQSD (my advise is to not use arrow keys otherwise the page will scroll).
  • Left click on your mouse to use your sonar. It will bounce accross the cave and reveal hidden walls. Choose the direction of the sonar using your mouse.
  • Locate the exit of the cave to find the hidden treasure! 

Controls:

Move vampireArrow keys / WASD / ZQSD Use sonarMouse left click

This game has been made in 3 hours for Trijam 167 (theme: heightened senses) by Nicolas.
